final_mermaid_code:
graph TB
    subgraph Pool
        A[New claim received] --> B[Determine likelihood of the claim]
        B --> |insured liable| C[Assess claim]
        B --> |insured not liable| D[Case closed]
        C --> E{XORGateway}
        E --> |all cases| F[Advise claimant]
        E --> |decision is positive| G[Initiate payment]
        F --> H{XORGateway}
        G --> H
        H --> I[Claim closed]
    end
